How LIFEAID Sales Stayed Healthy Despite CrossFit Controversy & Gym Closures - LIFEAID Beverage Co. Blog
s: July 15, 2020 - Faced with this wildly difficult environment, how is the brand doing? It sold out of its IMMUNITYAID product. Direct-to-consumer sales on its website have doubled and Amazon sales have tripled since March, per the company. Overall, the company is still experiencing growth numbers similar to as if it were a “normal” year with a stretch goal of hitting $50m in sales. So how did LIFEAID ...
